MC2Point determineCentroid (  const GfxFeature &  feature,
const GfxData &  featGfx,
const DrawingProjection &  projection,
bool &  toAdd
) 
 

Determines centroid of feature polygon.

Parameters:
feature Current feature to be drawn.
featGfx gfx data for feature.
projection Current projection.
toAdd Will return whether or not this feature should be added to the draw list.
Returns:
Center of the featGfx polygon.

bool isStreetFeature (  const GfxFeature &  feature  ) 
 

true if the feature is some kind of a street feature

bool mergeAndDrawStreetNames (  GfxFeature::gfxFeatureType  type,
uint32  scaleLevel,
bool  smallImage,
bool  merge = false
) 
 

Find out if a street feature is a candidate for 1: merging in order to draw more names in the image, or 2: drawing the name of the feature.

Parameters:
type The feature type.
scaleLevel The scaleLevel of the image.
smallImage If the image is small (width <= 250 pixels)
merge Set to true if test is for merging, set to false if test is for drawing.

bool roadSignName (  const char *  name  ) 
 

Find out if a name is a roadSign name: The criterias are: 1: max 3 chars in the name 2: only digits in the name, or the name starts with E, M or A.

A name beginning with E will result in eroadsign with green colour, the rest will be roadsign with blue colour.

void sortAndCreateFeatureNotices (  GfxFeatureMap *  featureMap,
MapSettings *  mapSettings,
vector< featurenotice_t > &  notices,
bool  singleDraw,
bool  checkOverlappingObjects,
bool  includeHiddenFeatures,
bool  poiFiltering = true,
ObjectBoxes *  objectBBoxes = NULL
) 
 

Adds notices to notices vector in draworder.

Parameters:
featureMap The GfxFeatureMap to sort.
mapSettings The MapSettings if any, may be NULL.
notices Set to contain the sorted notices.
singleDraw If the notices should contain duplicates for polygons that should be drawn twice, or if poi:s should be removed if they are located on the same spot.
checkOverlappingObjects If set to true, overlapping objects will not be allowed. Make sure the objectBBoxes parameter is set in case this param is true.
includeHiddenFeatures If set to true, hidden features will be included.
poiFiltering Optional parameter. Set to true the server should make sure that not too many poi:s are added. This parameter is only valid if checkOverlappingObjects are set to true.
objectBBoxes If specified, set to contain the boundingboxes in mc2 coordinates of all added objects that must not be overlapped (POI/WCPOI/TRAFFIC_INFO:s etc). Note that this parameter must be specified if checkOverlappingObjects is set to true.
